post.title: First Counter-Strike 2 LAN Show Match - Hellcase Blog
post.excerpt: It has become a tradition of CS:GO tournaments to host show matches before the Grand Finals to warm the audience and set the atmosphere ahead of the high-stakes grand finals, and ESL Pro League Season 17 continued this tradition. However, the show ma
post.content_html:
It has become a tradition of CS:GO tournaments to host show matches before the Grand Finals to warm the audience and set the atmosphere ahead of the high-stakes grand finals, and ESL Pro League Season 17 continued this tradition. However, the show match at this event went into history as the first-ever Counter-Strike 2 LAN show match.

In article you will find:

  • ESL Pro League Season 17 CS2 Show Match
  • Who Played In The First-Ever Counter-Strike 2 Show Match?
  • Highlights From ESL‚Äôs First-Ever Counter-Strike 2 Show Match
  • Where To Watch The Counter-Strike 2 Show Match?
  • Bonus: First CS:GO Show Match Ever
  • To Wrap Up!

ESL Pro League Season 17 CS2 Show Match

The Playoff Stage of the ESL Pro League Season 17 was held from March 21 to March 26 in Saint Julian‚Äôs, Malta. On March 26, Cloud9 and FaZe Clan fought in the BO5 Grand Final to secure the championship title, the prize of $200,000, and slots at BLAST World Final 2023 and IEM Cologne 2023.

Before the ESL Pro League Season 17 Grand Final started, fans at the venue and on online streams were blessed with a first-ever official Counter-Strike 2 show match on LAN.

Who Played In The First-Ever Counter-Strike 2 Show Match?

Here are the line-ups of two teams that participated in the first Counter-Strike 2 show match.

The Beta Boys

  • Guy ‚Äú‚Å†NertZ‚Å†‚Äù Iluz (ENCE)
  • Casper ‚Äú‚Å†cadiaN‚Å†‚Äù M√∏ller (Heroic)
  • (C) Harry ‚Äú‚Å†JustHarry‚Å†‚Äù Russell (Talent)
  • Ren√© ‚Äú‚Å†TeSeS‚Å†‚Äù Madsen (Heroic)
  • Vladislav ‚Äú‚Å†Krad‚Å†‚Äù Kravchenko (FORZE)

Team 27015

  • Petr ‚Äú‚Å†fame‚Å†‚Äù Bolyshev (Outsiders)
  • Pawe≈Ç ‚Äú‚Å†dycha‚Å†‚Äù Dycha (ENCE)
  • (C) Richard ‚Äú‚Å†Xizt‚Å†‚Äù Landstr√∂m (Coach of Heroic)
  • Aleksandr ‚Äú‚Å†shalfey‚Å†‚Äù Marenov (FORZE)
  • Marco ‚Äú‚Å†Snappi‚Å†‚Äù Pfeiffer (ENCE)

Highlights From ESL‚Äôs First-Ever Counter-Strike 2 Show Match

The Counter-Strike 2 show match began with players of The Beta Boys and Team 27015 entering the scene.

While JustHarry and Xizt participated in the short pre-match interview, Cadian ran up to Harry Russel to jokingly bully the captain. Heroic‚Äôs coach Xizt admitted that working with this player is rough.

After the captains of both teams shook their hands, players prepared for the first-ever Counter-Strike 2 LAN show match to start.

The Limited Test of Counter-Strike 2 began a few days ago after Valve announced the update would launch in the summer of 2023. Right now, the only map available to play in Counter-Strike 2 is de_dust2, this is why the CS2 show match before the ESL Pro League Season 17 Grand Final was played on this map.

The Beta Boys started the match on the T side, and Team 27015 was playing on the CT side. The pistol round ended with a quick win for Xizt‚Äôs team.

A few rounds later, TeSeS performed a clutch solely winning the round against his two opponents from Team 27015, shalfey and dycha. Madsen used AK-47 | Legion of Anubis.

In the fifth round of the show match, NertZ got a double kill with his AWP | Dragon Lore and then threw a grenade into the smoke to get a vision on the opponent and secure a triple kill.

In the next round, Krad smoked the Mid Doors and then threw a grenade to peek behind the doors, where he noticed Snappi and took him down immediately.

Krad killed two opponents pushing from A Short with his Galil AR, then hit another with a grenade.

Later into the first half of the historical Counter-Strike 2 show match, JustHarry from The Beta Boys was left alone to clutch the round against shalfey, Snappi, and Xizt. Spoiler alert: he nailed the round using his M4A1-S | Emphorosaur-S.

CadiaN showed a trick to prevent the smoke grenade from landing on XBOX with a Molotov. Watch and learn!

Who said coaches don‚Äôt play? Heroic‚Äôs coach Xizt hit an awesome highlight taking down two defenders from Tunnels.

In the seventeenth round, The Beta Boys had an eco and decided to aggressively push Top Mid by performing a trick with smoke and a grenade, but dycha, Snappi, and shalfey denied the push.

Counter-Strike 2 has been out only for a few days, so technical issues will be a thing for a while. In this show match, players had trouble staying connected, but everyone enjoyed dycha‚Äôs character dancing.

The first-ever Counter-Strike 2 LAN show match ended with Team 27015 defeating The Beta Boys with a 16:14 score. GG!

Where To Watch The Counter-Strike 2 Show Match ?

The first-ever Counter-Strike 2 LAN show match between Team Beta Boys and Team 27015 held before the ESL Pro League Season 17 Grand Final is surely going down in history.

Do not worry if, for some reason, you missed all the action on the live stream, as this show match was recorded, and you can watch it anytime you want. Click here to watch the recorded BO1 Counter-Strike 2 show match on ESL‚Äôs Twitch Channel.

Bonus: First CS:GO Show Match Ever

ESL also dived into history and posted the link to the first-ever Counter-Strike: Global Offensive show match that happened at the Intel Extreme Masters Global Challenge New York they organized in October 2011.

To Wrap Up!

ESL held a great Counter-Strike 2 show match we all enjoyed, and it is going down in history.

New details on Counter-Strike 2 are revealed daily, so visit our blog to stay updated. Also, this is a friendly reminder to not fall victim to scammers offering you CS2 beta keys as the only way to access the Limited Test is from the main menu of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.

So far, we have covered the latest CS2 leaks found by data miners . Also, we explained how exactly the new sub-tick system will better your Counter-Strike 2 experience. Explore our blog for articles about CS:GO skins and other cosmetics, in-depth game guides, and esports news. Stay tuned for more!
